description: Official faction emblems/logos - flat 2D graphics for flags, buildings, UI

prompt.description: Circle emblem with a STARBURST/SUN in the center with pointed rays radiating outward, surrounded by LAUREL WREATH branches on left and right sides, small STARS scattered around
TREFOIL shape - THREE POINTED BLADES arranged vertically: one central blade pointing UP, two curved blades on sides pointing DOWN and OUTWARD like a stylized trident or triple-blade weapon
prompt.colors: Red symbol on black, or black symbol on red

prompt.description: BIRD OF PREY viewed from FRONT with WINGS SPREAD WIDE, the bird is GRIPPING TWO CIRCULAR PLANETS (Romulus and Remus) in its TALONS, predatory eagle/raptor design
prompt.colors: Green bird on darker green or black background

prompt.description: Vertical POINTED OVAL or EYE shape, like an almond or marquise, with internal geometric lines forming a stylized face or abstract pattern inside, militaristic angular design
Stylized FERENGI HEAD in PROFILE (side view) showing the distinctive LARGE EAR prominently, bald head silhouette facing left or right
prompt.shape: Head profile silhouette with big ear

prompt.description: Abstract ORGANIC SWIRL or SPIRAL shape, flowing curved lines that suggest liquid or morphing, like a stylized comma or paisley, smooth elegant curves
Geometric OCTAGON or HEXAGON shape with internal CIRCUIT-LIKE PATTERNS, technological grid lines, possibly a central circular 'eye' node, mechanical/cybernetic aesthetic
prompt.colors: Black/dark gray with green glowing accents

prompt.description: Abstract angular shape suggesting their HELMET - vertical elongated form with geometric patterns, cold crystalline aesthetic, mysterious alien geometry
DIAMOND or RHOMBUS shape (square rotated 45 degrees), aggressive angular design, possibly with reptilian claw or fang motifs inside
Design suggesting TWIN ANTENNAE - two curved lines meeting at top like a stylized 'V' or antenna pair, elegant symmetrical curves spreading outward, ice crystal aesthetic
IDIC symbol: a TRIANGLE pointing DOWN with a CIRCLE or GEM inside it, or overlapping geometric shapes representing Infinite Diversity in Infinite Combinations
Flowing SPIRAL or FLAME shape, curved organic lines suggesting the Prophets' celestial nature, like a stylized flame or curved teardrop with internal swirls
CRYSTALLINE WEB pattern - interconnected TRIANGLES forming a larger geometric shape, like a faceted crystal or spider web made of straight lines
Curved WING or CRESCENT shape, like spread bird wings or a curved blade, suggesting piracy and danger, flowing elegant but threatening curves
CIRCULAR design with SPOTS pattern - dots or circles arranged within a larger circle, representing the symbiont spots, organic cellular appearance
EARTH GLOBE with a SWORD or DAGGER piercing THROUGH it vertically, aggressive imperial imagery showing conquest of Earth
prompt.colors: Gold globe, silver sword, red/black accents

prompt.description: Simple angular RESISTANCE symbol - possibly a stylized 'M' or arrow shape, rough guerrilla fighter aesthetic, grassroots rebellion design
ORGANIC TRIPOD shape - three curved appendages radiating from center like their bio-ships, alien biological aesthetic

styleGuide.material: FLAT 2D graphic symbol - absolutely NO 3D effects, NO metallic shine, NO depth
styleGuide.quality: Clean vector-style art with solid color fills, crisp edges
styleGuide.lighting: NONE - flat colors only, no shadows, no highlights, no gradients
styleGuide.composition: Symbol perfectly centered, fills 80-90% of square frame
critical: FLAT 2D GRAPHIC ONLY - like a flag emblem or logo
NO 3D rendering, NO perspective, NO depth
Simple bold shapes that read well at small sizes
Clean outlines, solid fills, no texture
